seo.description: Discover our story, our passion for Berber craftsmanship and our commitment to artisans from the Rif mountains.

about.heading: About Rif Raw Straw
about.intro: The <brand>Rif Raw Straw</brand> adventure began with a shared passion: to reveal the beauty of Berber craftsmanship and share it with the world.
about.paragraph1: Since our beginnings, we have been exploring workshops, markets and villages in search of talented creators. Each encounter, each object, each story fuels our desire to promote handmade and authenticity.
about.paragraph2: Today, our shop reflects this quest: a demanding selection, unique pieces, and a desire to weave a link between artisans and lovers of beauty.
about.paragraph3: Thank you for being part of this adventure and supporting craftsmanship with us.
